about_the_game:
Do you want to experience speed? This is a unique casual racing game. Players will experience the extreme speed and stimulation, as if they are in a real racing venue.



The racing race in the game is carried out from the first person's perspective. Players can personally feel the pleasure of driving a car. Driving a car and other players to compete fiercely. In the shortest time, the full journey, surpass the opponent, and finally win. In addition to some basic operations, players also need to pay attention to the surrounding environment to avoid collisions with other cars.
The game provides a variety of tracks for players to choose from, including city glaciers, snow, deserts, grasslands, etc. Each track has unique characteristics and difficulty. Players need to complete the competition of each track in order to unlock the next game in the next game. Taoist scene.



In the game, you will see a variety of dinosaurs watching the game with you. They are watching quietly next to the road, running on the roadside, or flying in the air, adding Many unique atmosphere. Dinosaurs stopped around the track, which added some fun to the game. At the same time, dinosaurs also added some visual impact to the game, allowing players to feel more real and special racing scenes.

In short, this is a very good casual racing game. Players can feel speed and stimulation in the game, and at the same time experience the real sense and interest of the racing field. If you like racing games, try this game, I believe you will fall in love with it!

Racing control:

The right handle trigger button of the accelerator
Turn to the left handle left/right button
Both brake right handle grip key
Paralysis menu key

name: VR Racing on Dinosaur Island

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy VR Racing on Dinosaur Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: Do you want to experience speed? This is a unique casual racing game. Players will experience the extreme speed and stimulation, as if they are in a real racing venue.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
